availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, clerk. Virginia native. Appointed Postmaster for West Liberty, Kentucky, on April 30, 1847. Clerk in Morgan County in 1850. Clerk in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Morgan County, Kentucky. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 108.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 690-91, (accessed via Ancestry.com).
